ygData.subject: RE: I feel a nerf a coming...
ygData.msgSnippet: The bard quests may be easy at 30th level, but I have not found them particularly easy at 20ish.  On the other hand I completed my fourth shaman piece last
ygData.messageBody:
The bard quests may be easy at 30th level, but I have not found them
particularly easy at 20ish. On the other hand I completed my fourth shaman
piece last week with my 21st level bard, and I did all the required killing
myself for 3 of the pieces. I've also done 3 crafted quests, including the
slaying required, and 1 ranger piece. I'm halfway thru about 5 bard pieces.
If you think our quests are easy try some of the others, they make ours look
many levels off for me.

I have had no luck getting the icy greaves despite trying four times now.
I've spent about 6 hours in the king room with no luck. I know others have
been more fortunate on this note, but since the critters involved are still
far beyond my means for almost all the bard quests, while the critters for
some of the other classes' quests are not, I don't believe ours are as weak
as people seem to think. Our quests are relatively easy for the level
Verant seems to think should be doing the quests (30-35). Other classes can
get some pieces 10 levels before this easily although some of their pieces
may be fairly difficult.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Dave Gaines [mailto:dave@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 30, 1999 6:40 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] I feel a nerf a coming...


From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>

Admit it, the bard quests are much too easy. I don't know how many of
my items I got by just entering a zone, ooc'ing that I needed an item for
the bard quests, please let me know if you find one, and then walking out
15 minutes later with the item...

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
